action.name: Two Weapon Fighting
entries: Each Wildman has two axe attacks per round.

action.name: Axe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6 + 0) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, range 80/320, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Spellcasting
entries: The wildmen druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. The wildmen druid's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 10, +2 to hit with spell attacks). The wildmen druid has the following druid spells prepared: Cantrip (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh 1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave 2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin

action.name: Quarterstaff (One-Handed)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff (Two-Handed)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff (Shillelagh)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Whip
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Hand Lash
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage. An item or weapon is wrenched from the creatures hand and lands at the Bariarwhips' feet. Target can make a DC12 STR save test to avoid.

action.name: Go for the EYES
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage. Target must make a DC12 DEX saving throw or be at disadvantage on all attack rolls till the end of its next round. Target is immune to this effect if the target is wearing any goggles or full helm.

reaction.name: Twisting Parry
entries: The Briarwhip adds +2 to its AC against one attack.

trait.name: Beast Call (Recharge 6)
entries: As an action, the Wildman Beast Caller summons a beast that appears within 5 ft.

trait.name: Beast Fury
entries: As an action, the Wildman Beast Caller may command one beast that it is allied with to make an attack.

trait.name: Command
entries: As a bonus action, the Wildman Beast Caller may command one beast that it is allied with to move up to half its movement.

action.name: Quarterstaff (One-handed)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff (Two-handed)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Multi-Attack
entries: The Feral Wildling can make two attacks.

trait.name: Strength in Numbers
entries: The Save DC for Grab attack increases by 2 for each Feral Wildling that has already attacked this round.

action.name: Dagger
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage in melee, or 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage at range.

action.name: Grab
entries: The target must make a DC 13 Athletics or Acrobatics check to avoid being knocked prone.

reaction.name: Snatching Hands
entries: If a creature is prone, the Feral wildling can prevent the creature from rising. The target can roll a DC13 Athletics or Acrobatics to avoid being snatched.

trait.name: Spellcasting
entries: The wildmen earth caller is a 4th-level spellcaster. The wildmen earth caller's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 10, +2 to hit with spell attacks). The wildmen earth caller has the following cleric spells prepared: Cantrip (at will): toll the dead, resistance, thaumaturgy 1st level (4 slots): inflict wounds, shield of faith, bane 2nd level (3 slots): silence, blindness/deafness

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The wildmen earth caller makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Staff of the Adder
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. You can make a melee attack using the snake head, which has a reach of 5 feet. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 3d6 poison damage.

action.name: Staff of the Adder (Opposite End)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the wildmen berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: the wildmen unseen deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the wildmen unseen that isn't incapacitated and the wildmen unseen doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Mutiattack
entries: The wildmen unseen has two melee weapon attacks or one thrown attack.

action.name: Spike
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage in melee, or 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage at range.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, Marcus can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage in melee, or 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage at range.
